events.text:
I played guitar a few years ago, went to rock concerts and everything. Is it the stuff I like that makes me who I am?

But you know, I always wondered... why couldn't I just magically make myself like all music? I always hated christmas music, plugged my ears when they would play it. Wouldn't it be easier to just like christmas music too?

If I can't choose to like things, it has to be out of my control, and if it's out of my control, then it's not really me, is it?
